pkgmetadata.longdescription: [![Build Status](https://travis-ci.org/ambitioninc/pip-conflict-checker.png)](https://travis-ci.org/ambitioninc/pip-conflict-checker)pip-conflict-checker====================A tool that checks installed packages against all package requirements to ensure that there are no dependency version conflicts.## Installation```pip install pip-conflict-checker```### UsageSimply run the command pipconflictchecker. If any dependency conflicts are found an output dump of all conflicts will be shown,and an exit code of 1 will be returned.
